                                   Operation operation,
                                   Graph operationResultGraph,
                                   ExecutionContext executionContext)
                            throws Xdi2MessagingException

        Executes an XDI operation on an address.

        executeOnAddress in interface AddressHandler
        Parameters:
        targetXDIAddress - The target address.
        operation - The operation that is being executed.
        operationResultGraph - The result graph.
        executionContext - An "execution context" object for the entire XDI message envelope.
